Class GameEntity

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Actor, Ground, Item
public abstract class GameEntity extends Object
Base class for all objects that can exist in the game. It allows entities to have capabilities. Example #1: an actor that has the Status.PARALYZED capability cannot take any action. Example #2: an actor that has the Ability.ENTER_DOORS capability can enter a door. Note that the capabilities are not limited to Status or Ability. It can be of any enumeration type.

    List<Enum<?>>
    capabilitiesList()
    Get unmodifiable capabilities list Example #1: if the current entity has the Status.POISONED and Ability.FALL_FROM_CLIFF capabilities, this method will return a list of [Status.POISONED, Ability.FALL_FROM_CLIFF]
    <T extends Enum<?>>
    List<T>
    findCapabilitiesByType(Class<T> enumType)
    Get unmodifiable capabilities by a specific enum type Example #1: If we have an enumeration type called Status, we can get all the statuses that the current entity possesses by calling findCapabilitiesByType(Status.class)

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEntity

      public GameEntity()

  • Method Details

    • addCapability

      public void addCapability(Enum<?> capability)
      Add a capability to the current entity. Example #1: addCapability(Status.SLEEP) will add the Status.SLEEP capability to the current entity.
      Parameters:
      capability - the Capability to add

    • removeCapability

      public void removeCapability(Enum<?> capability)
      Remove a capability from this Actor. Example #1: removeCapability(Ability.OPEN_GATES) will remove the Ability.OPEN_GATES capability from the current entity.
      Parameters:
      capability - the Capability to remove

    • hasCapability

      public boolean hasCapability(Enum<?> capability)
      Check whether the current entity has a specific capability. Example #1: hasCapability(Status.BERSERK) will return true if the current entity has the Status.BERSERK capability.
      Parameters:
      capability - the capability to check against
      Returns:
      true if the current entity has the capability, false otherwise

    • capabilitiesList

      public List<Enum<?>> capabilitiesList()
      Get unmodifiable capabilities list Example #1: if the current entity has the Status.POISONED and Ability.FALL_FROM_CLIFF capabilities, this method will return a list of [Status.POISONED, Ability.FALL_FROM_CLIFF]
      Returns:
      a list of unmodifiable capabilities

    • findCapabilitiesByType

      public <T extends Enum<?>> List<T> findCapabilitiesByType(Class<T> enumType)
      Get unmodifiable capabilities by a specific enum type Example #1: If we have an enumeration type called Status, we can get all the statuses that the current entity possesses by calling findCapabilitiesByType(Status.class)
      Type Parameters:
      T - any enumeration type
      Parameters:
      enumType - Class type, to be filtered later
      Returns:
      list of enums based on type, empty list if type is not in the set.
